reason.tex: \begin{align} \tan^{-1}\frac{1}{z} &= \cot^{-1} z \\ \therefore \cot^{-1}\frac{1}{(1-x)} &= \tan^{-1}(1-x) \\ \implies \int_0^1 \cot^{-1}\left(\dfrac{1}{1-x}\right) \cdot dx &= \int_0^1 \tan^{-1} (1-x) \cdot dx \\ \text{But }\int_0^1\tan^{-1}(1-x) \cdot dx &= \int_0^1 \tan^{-1}\left(1-(1-x)\right)\cdot dx\\ &= \int_0^1 \tan^{-1}\tan^{-1} x \cdot dx \end{align}
